A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What did I just watch? The Last Jedi just seems subversive for its own sake and offers no payoffs for any storylines. I have loved Star Wars for nearly 40 years and am utterly disinterested in episode 9 now. Apparently Disney is the real First Order. I'm certain you'll be able to see Mickey Mouse ears on all the storm troopers if you watch the IMAX version.
